labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: your chat box gets blocked and "marks" it as a channel where u dont have permission to talk in
data.expected_result: You should be able to edit/type anything in the chatbox
data.short_description: Not being able to type anything or edit your message when right clicking on wumpus [NOTE: Must be on a server where u get the "hold up!" when u try to tag everyone/here]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your chat box - type atEveryone - press enter - right click the animated wumpus - observe your chat box
